name: ElasticLoadBalancingAppCookieStickinessPolicyType
description: The AppCookieStickinessPolicy type is an embedded property of the AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer type.

properties.name: CookieName
properties.description: Name of the application cookie used for stickiness.

properties.name: PolicyName
properties.description: The name of the policy being created. The name must be unique within the set of policies for this Load Balancer.
